information.name: Example - American Art in the 20th Century

query.name: 1900s
query.querystring:
PREFIX bmo: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/ontology/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX edan: <http://edan.si.edu/saam/id/ontologies/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX skos2: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos#> PREFIX thes: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/thesauri/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?image ?object (SAMPLE(?nameSample ) AS ?name ) (SAMPLE(?typeSample ) AS ?type ) (SAMPLE(?creatorSample ) AS ?creator ) (SAMPLE(?descriptionSample ) AS ?description ) (SAMPLE(?curatorialSample ) AS ?curatorial ) (SAMPLE(?depictsSample ) AS ?depicts )
WHERE {
?production a crm:E12_Production ; crm:P108_has_produced ?object .
{ ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } UNION { ?production crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } ?time a crm:E52_Time-Span ; rdfs:label ?date . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) >= 1900) . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) <= 1909) .
{ ?object crm:P48_has_preferred_identifier/rdfs:label ?identifier } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P102_has_title/rdfs:label ?nameSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P62_depicts/skos:prefLabel ?depictsSample } UNION { ?object crm:P128_carries/crm:P129_is_about/skos2:prefLabel ?depictsSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P45_consists_of/skos:prefLabel ?consists } UNION { ?object edan:PE_medium_description ?consists } } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?object bmo:PX_object_type/skos:prefLabel ?typeSample } UNION { ?object edan:PE_object_mainclass/skos2:prefLabel ?typeSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P32_used_general_technique/skos:prefLabel ?technique } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?production2 crm:P108_has_produced ?object . ?production2 crm:P14_carried_out_by/crm:P1_is_identified_by/rdfs:label ?creatorSample } UNION { ?production2 crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P14_carried_out_by/skos:prefLabel ?creatorSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_physical_description ?descriptionSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_curatorial_comment ?curatorialSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object crm:P138i_has_representation ?image } .
}
GROUP BY ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?object ?image
LIMIT 10

query.name: 1910s
query.querystring:
PREFIX bmo: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/ontology/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX edan: <http://edan.si.edu/saam/id/ontologies/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX skos2: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos#> PREFIX thes: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/thesauri/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?image ?object (SAMPLE(?nameSample ) AS ?name ) (SAMPLE(?typeSample ) AS ?type ) (SAMPLE(?creatorSample ) AS ?creator ) (SAMPLE(?descriptionSample ) AS ?description ) (SAMPLE(?curatorialSample ) AS ?curatorial ) (SAMPLE(?depictsSample ) AS ?depicts )
WHERE {
?production a crm:E12_Production ; crm:P108_has_produced ?object .
{ ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } UNION { ?production crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } ?time a crm:E52_Time-Span ; rdfs:label ?date . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) >= 1910) . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) <= 1919) .
{ ?object crm:P48_has_preferred_identifier/rdfs:label ?identifier } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P102_has_title/rdfs:label ?nameSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P62_depicts/skos:prefLabel ?depictsSample } UNION { ?object crm:P128_carries/crm:P129_is_about/skos2:prefLabel ?depictsSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P45_consists_of/skos:prefLabel ?consists } UNION { ?object edan:PE_medium_description ?consists } } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?object bmo:PX_object_type/skos:prefLabel ?typeSample } UNION { ?object edan:PE_object_mainclass/skos2:prefLabel ?typeSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P32_used_general_technique/skos:prefLabel ?technique } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?production2 crm:P108_has_produced ?object . ?production2 crm:P14_carried_out_by/crm:P1_is_identified_by/rdfs:label ?creatorSample } UNION { ?production2 crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P14_carried_out_by/skos:prefLabel ?creatorSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_physical_description ?descriptionSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_curatorial_comment ?curatorialSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object crm:P138i_has_representation ?image } .
}
GROUP BY ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?object ?image
LIMIT 10

query.querystring:
PREFIX bmo: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/ontology/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX edan: <http://edan.si.edu/saam/id/ontologies/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX skos2: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos#> PREFIX thes: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/thesauri/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

query.name: 1990s
query.querystring:
PREFIX bmo: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/ontology/> PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX edan: <http://edan.si.edu/saam/id/ontologies/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX skos2: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos#> PREFIX thes: <http://collection.britishmuseum.org/id/thesauri/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
SELECT ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?image ?object (SAMPLE(?nameSample ) AS ?name ) (SAMPLE(?typeSample ) AS ?type ) (SAMPLE(?creatorSample ) AS ?creator ) (SAMPLE(?descriptionSample ) AS ?description ) (SAMPLE(?curatorialSample ) AS ?curatorial ) (SAMPLE(?depictsSample ) AS ?depicts )
WHERE {
?production a crm:E12_Production ; crm:P108_has_produced ?object .
{ ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } UNION { ?production crm:P4_has_time-span ?time } ?time a crm:E52_Time-Span ; rdfs:label ?date . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) >= 1990) . FILTER (xsd:integer(?date ) <= 1999) .
{ ?object crm:P48_has_preferred_identifier/rdfs:label ?identifier } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P102_has_title/rdfs:label ?nameSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P62_depicts/skos:prefLabel ?depictsSample } UNION { ?object crm:P128_carries/crm:P129_is_about/skos2:prefLabel ?depictsSample } } .
OPTIONAL { { ?object crm:P45_consists_of/skos:prefLabel ?consists } UNION { ?object edan:PE_medium_description ?consists } } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?object bmo:PX_object_type/skos:prefLabel ?typeSample } UNION { ?object edan:PE_object_mainclass/skos2:prefLabel ?typeSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?production crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P32_used_general_technique/skos:prefLabel ?technique } .
OPTIONAL { { { ?production2 crm:P108_has_produced ?object . ?production2 crm:P14_carried_out_by/crm:P1_is_identified_by/rdfs:label ?creatorSample } UNION { ?production2 crm:P9_consists_of/crm:P14_carried_out_by/skos:prefLabel ?creatorSample } } } .
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_physical_description ?descriptionSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object bmo:PX_curatorial_comment ?curatorialSample }.
OPTIONAL { ?object crm:P138i_has_representation ?image } .
}
GROUP BY ?identifier ?consists ?date ?technique ?object ?image
LIMIT 10

entity.name: Iceberg, Head of Bowdoin Bay, July 1892--Greenland
entity.creator: Frank W. Stokes

entity.name: In the Gardens of the Villa Palmieri
entity.creator: J. Carroll Beckwith

entity.name: Mercanto di Legumi alla Fiera

entity.name: Locomotive Study (alternate design for mural study, Bowling Green, Kentucky Post Office)

entity.depicts: New Deal-Treasury Section of Painting and Sculpture-Kentucky

entity.creator: George Stillman

entity.name: Black Rectangle
entity.consists: brush and ink and ink wash on paper
entity.creator: Samuel Lewis Francis

entity.name: Ferme a St. Jean de Monts

entity.name: Nick Biondi, Golden Gloves boxer, with unidentified figure

entity.name: Black and White Indian (Quicksilver Messenger Service, Howlin' Wolf...Avalon Ballroom, San Francisco, California 7/26/68-7/28/68)

entity.name: Indestructible Object
entity.consists: wood, fiber, metal, and paper on cardboard
entity.creator: Emmanuel Radnitsky

entity.name: MOTHER GOOSE Records: SITTIN BY THE WINDOW (M. MIKE) / ANGIE

entity.name: Mother and Child at the Beach (Version II)

entity.name: Zebra, from the portfolio Series II

entity.name: Alexander Von Humboldt Monument, New York City, from the series The American Monument
entity.creator: Lee Norman Friedlander

entity.name: Antique Shop, from the Kansas Documentary Survey Project

entity.name: Civil War Memorial, Bennington, Vermont, from the series The American Monument

entity.name: General Lafayette, Burlington, Vermont, from the series The American Monument
entity.creator: Lee Norman Friedlander

entity.name: The American Spirit, Bennington, Vermont, from the series The American Monument

entity.name: Baptist Missionaries Teaching the Children about Jesus and Watermelon at the River Park Projects: Rochester, New York

entity.name: Donald Douglas Drive at Lakewood Boulevard

entity.name: Statue of Liberty, Trinidad, Colorado, from the portfolio Statues of Liberty

entity.name: Swimmer, Honolulu, Hawaii, from the series Shooting for the Gold

entity.name: Portrait, from the portfolio A.G.B. 1 + 10
entity.consists: etching: asphaltum stopout relief, acquatint and hardground on paper

entity.name: Vase #65-78

entity.name: Vortices and Reveries

entity.name: When She Was Bad...

entity.creator: Rosanne Somerson
